channel.title: I was attacked but didn't die
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was playing as the fool, on night 2 I used frame and I got the message saying "You were attacked last night" but I didn't die. I was not healed or guarded the King as far as I know, and I didn't get the heal or immune message.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I think I was supposed to die? Idk maybe I wasn't even attacked and the game just told me I was?
#### Steps to reproduce: Im not sure what caused it, but I used frame that night. Also psychic linked that night in case that matters somehow.
#### Comments: Here is a picture of the bug. Ignore the graveyard and my name in red, that happened after I was executed as fool.
https://imgur.com/a/KdEpv

item.title: I was attacked but didn't die
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
What happened?

I was playing as the fool, on night 2 I used frame and I got the message saying “You were attacked last night” but I didn’t die. I was not healed or guarded the King as far as I know, and I didn’t get the heal or immune message.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I think I was supposed to die? Idk maybe I wasn’t even attacked and the game just told me I was?

Steps to reproduce:

Im not sure what caused it, but I used frame that night. Also psychic linked that night in case that matters somehow.

Comments:

Here is a picture of the bug. Ignore the graveyard and my name in red, that happened after I was executed as fool.

https://imgur.com/a/KdEpv

Read full topic
